title: Android app deals of the day: Iron Marines, Dark Rage, Screen Lock Pro, and more
content:
Friday’s best Android app deals courtesy of Google Play have now been organized for you down below. Those offers are also joined by notable price drops on the Moto G Stylus 2022 Android smartphone and Samsung’s ANC Galaxy Buds Pro. our collection of app deals is headlined by titles like Iron Marines, Dark Rage, Screen Lock Pro, Default App Manager, Green Project, and more. Hit the jump for a complete look at Friday’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
